<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103311</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103311</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206745</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Launching the New U.S. Navy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausstoßen der neuen VEREINIGTE STAATEN Marine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lancement de la nouvelle marine des ETATS-UNIS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lançando a marinha nova de ESTADOS UNIDOS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lancio del blu marino nuovo degli STATI UNITI</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προώθηση του νέου ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟΥ ναυτικού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lanzar la Marina de guerra nueva de ESTADOS UNIDOS</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells how and why our Navy was created. After the Revolutionary War, Barbary pirates preyed on American vessels and held seamen for ransom. In 1794, Congress reestablished the Navy with authorization for six vessels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt wie und warum unsere Marine hergestellt 
wurde. Nach dem revolutionären Krieg preyed Barbary Piraten auf
amerikanischen Behältern und hielten Matrosen für Lösegeld 
an. 1794 stellte Kongreß die Marine mit Ermächtigung für 
sechs Behälter wieder her.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit qu'et pourquoi notre marine a été créée. 
Après la guerre révolutionnaire, les pirates de Barbarie ont 
attaqué sur les navires américains et ont tenu des marins pour la 
rançon. En 1794, le congrès a rétabli la marine avec 
l'autorisation pour six navires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz como e porque nossa marinha foi criada. 
Após a guerra revolucionária, os piratas de Barbary rapinaram 
em embarcações americanas e prenderam seamen para o ransom. Em
1794, o congress reestablished a marinha com autorização para seis 
embarcações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice a come ed a perchè il nostro blu marino è 
stato creato. Dopo la guerra rivoluzionaria, i pirati di Barbary
hanno predato ai vasi americani ed hanno tenuto i marinai per il 
riscatto. In 1794, il congresso ha ristabilito il blu marino
con autorizzazione per sei vasi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει πώς και γιατί το ναυτικό μας δημιουργήθηκε. 
Μετά από τον επαναστατικό πόλεμο, οι πειρατές Βαρβαρίας 
στα αμερικανικά σκάφη και κράτησαν τους ναυτικούς για τα λύτρα. 
Το 1794, το συνέδριο επανεγκαθίδρυσε το ναυτικό με την 
έγκριση για έξι σκάφη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dice cómo y porqué nuestra Marina de guerra fue 
creada. Después de la guerra revolucionaria, los piratas de 
Barbary cazaron en los recipientes americanos y sostuvieron a 
marineros para el rescate. En 1794, el congreso restableció 
la Marina de guerra con la autorización para seis recipientes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206745</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103311</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/launching-the-new-u-s-navy</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
